item.title: 中国人工智能初创企业引发科技股恐慌，ASML下挫
item.description: 由于中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 引发了对西方技术主导地位的担忧，ASML Holding NV 股价周一与全球科技股一起下跌。【原文：ASML Holding NV shares tanked along with global technology stocks on Monday as Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek sparked fear over Western technological dominance.】

item.title: 中国的 DeepSeek 是什么？为什么它让人工智能世界如此震惊？
item.description: DeepSeek 是一家成立刚满一年的人工智能初创公司，其突破性的人工智能模型在硅谷引起了惊叹和愕然，该模型的性能可与世界上最好的聊天机器人媲美，而成本似乎只是它们的一小部分。DeepSeek 在中国杭州创立，对全球科技产业和供应链具有深远影响，与人们普遍认为未来的人工智能将需要越来越多的电力和能源才能实现的观点形成了鲜明对比。【原文：DeepSeek, an AI startup just over a year old, stirred awe and consternation in Silicon Valley with its breakthrough artificial intelligence model that offered comparable performance to the world’s best chatbots at seemingly a fraction of the cost. Created in China’s Hangzhou, DeepSeek carries far-reaching implications for the global tech industry and supply chain, offering a counterpoint to the widespread belief that the future of AI will require ever-increasing amounts of power and energy to de】

item.title: 英国将于 2027 年与欧洲同步实现 T+1 转换
item.description: 领导英国向更快交易制度转变的工作组建议与欧盟采用相同的过渡日期，为金融业青睐的协调行动做好准备。【原文：The taskforce spearheading the UK’s shift to a faster trading regime is recommending the same transition date as the European Union, teeing up a coordinated move favored by the finance industry.】

item.title: 特朗普发出威胁后，中国承诺收回非法移民
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对拒绝遣返被驱逐移民的哥伦比亚征收高达 50%的关税后，中国承诺接受在美国的无证中国公民回国。【原文：China pledged to accept the return of undocumented Chinese citizens in the US, after President Donald Trump threatened to hit Colombia with tariffs of up to 50% for refusing to take back deported migrants.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯开放圣城的外国房地产投资
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯表示，将开始允许外国人投资于拥有圣城麦加和麦地那房地产的上市公司，以吸引更多的海外投资。【原文：Saudi Arabia said it will begin allowing foreigners to invest in publicly-traded companies owning real estate in the holy cities of Makkah and Madinah as the kingdom looks to draw in more overseas investment.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命印度投资银行领导人，瓦德瓦尼离职
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）提拔了两位最资深的交易员担任印度投资银行部联席主管，因为这家美国贷款机构在纳文-瓦德瓦尼（Navin Wadhwani）最近离职后，正努力加强其在印度市场的地位。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has promoted two of its most senior dealmakers as co-heads of investment banking in India as the US lender seeks to strengthen its position in the market following the recent departure of Navin Wadhwani.】

item.title: 据说日本生命将在并购狂潮后重整海外业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本生命保险株式会社将重组其海外业务，以更好地监控其最近在海外进行的一系列收购活动所带来的风险。【原文：Nippon Life Insurance Co. will reorganize its overseas operations to better monitor risks from its recent spate of acquisitions abroad, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 珠宝商法拉利集团启动阿姆斯特丹首次公开募股计划
item.description: 奢侈品物流公司法拉利集团（Ferrari Group Plc）宣布计划在阿姆斯特丹进行首次公开募股，成为今年欧洲首批寻求上市的公司之一。【原文：Luxury logistics company Ferrari Group Plc announced plans to launch an initial public offering in Amsterdam, becoming one of Europe’s first companies to seek a listing this year.】

item.title: 富士电视台社长因歌星性丑闻下台
item.description: 富士电视网络公司（Fuji Television Network Inc.【原文：The president of Fuji Television Network Inc. and the chairman of its parent company will both step down over the handling of a sexual harassment scandal that has already toppled one of Japan’s most prominent TV hosts.】

item.title: 欧盟将同意延长对俄罗斯的制裁，匈牙利将退让一步
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，欧盟将于周一就俄罗斯对乌克兰发动战争一事同意延长对俄罗斯的制裁，匈牙利也准备取消对这一举措的反对。【原文：The European Union is set agree to extend sanctions on Russia over its war against Ukraine on Monday with Hungary ready to lift its opposition to the move, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非非洲人国民大会希望国库拯救 Transnet
item.description: 南非最大的政党将要求国家财政部在下个月的预算之前考虑为国有铁路和港口运营商 Transnet SOC Ltd. 提供一次性债务减免方案。【原文：South Africa’s biggest political party will ask the National Treasury to consider a once-off debt-relief package for state-owned rail and ports operator Transnet SOC Ltd. before next month’s budget.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市本周开局不利
越南政治改革向二月议会投票迈进
item.description: 越南对国家政治体制进行了全面改革，包括合并关键部委和削减工作岗位，该改革已获得共产党最高机构的批准，目前正等待议会采取行动。【原文：Vietnam’s overhaul of the nation’s political system that includes merging key ministries and slashing jobs has been approved by a top communist party body and now awaits parliament action.】

item.title: 香港连锁健身房 Physical 听证会后走向清盘
item.description: 香港连锁健身房 Physical Beauty & Fitness Holdings Ltd. 在香港收到清盘令，法官称该公司已资不抵债。【原文：Hong Kong gym chain Physical Beauty & Fitness Holdings Ltd. received a liquidation order in Hong Kong after the judge said the company is insolvent.】

item.title: 利率对非洲经济的束缚将缓慢放松
item.description: 在接下来的一个月里，占非洲大陆国内生产总值近四分之三的非洲国家在权衡美国保护主义政策对其经济和通胀带来的风险时，将对利率采取不同的态度。【原文：Over the course of the next month, African nations representing almost three-quarters of the continent’s gross domestic product are set to stake out different approaches to interest rates, as they weigh the risks of protectionist US policies on their economies and inflation.】

item.title: 泰国向老年人发放 8.9 亿美元以促进经济发展
item.description: 泰国政府为解决高昂的生活费用和刺激本国疲软的经济而实施了一项计划，该计划的一部分就是在本周一向本国老年人发放约 300 亿泰铢（约合 8.9 亿美元）的补助金。【原文：Thailand transferred about 30 billion baht ($890 million) to its senior citizens on Monday, part of a government program to tackle the high cost of living and stimulate the nation’s sluggish economy.】

item.description:
阿瑟-门施（Arthur Mensch）是法国人工智能冠军 Mistral 的公众形象代言人，但另一家初创公司的首席执行官对其 60 亿美元的估值至关重要

item.title: 欧元区增长乏力将使欧洲央行继续降息
item.description: 欧元区经济欠佳的表现让欧洲中央银行相信，它可以通过在本周连续第四次会议上降低利率来进一步放松对经济增长的束缚。【原文：The euro-area economy’s sub-par performance is convincing the European Central Bank that it can further loosen the shackles on growth by lowering interest rates for a fourth straight meeting this week.】

item.title: 内阁对里夫斯英国机场计划的支持仍存疑虑
item.description: 英国内阁大臣们正在质疑伦敦希思罗机场、盖特威克机场和卢顿机场的扩建计划是否会对经济增长产生预期的影响，因为英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的经济增长计划在政府内部酝酿着紧张局势。【原文：UK cabinet ministers are questioning whether a proposed expansion of London’s Heathrow, Gatwick and Luton airports would have the growth impact intended, as tensions brew within government over Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ growth plans.】

item.title: 现在招聘：埃隆-马斯克的政府效率部建立了招聘网站
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "政府效率部"（Department of Government Efficiency）建立了一个新的招聘网站，为软件工程师和其他技术人员招聘全职受薪职位。【原文：Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency has set up a new job site to recruit full-time, salaried positions for software engineers and other tech staffers.】

item.title: 印度央行购买债券将收益率推至三年低点
item.description: 在数据显示印度央行大量购债以帮助缓解现金短缺之后，印度主权债券收益率下滑至近三年来的最低水平。【原文：Indian sovereign bond yields slid to their lowest level in nearly three years after data showed the central bank made significant debt purchases to help ease a cash shortage.】

item.title: 印度征集证券市场监管机构负责人候选人
item.description: 印度政府已就市场监管机构印度证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Board of India）主席一职发出邀请，这表明印度政府正在寻求接替现任主席玛达比-普里-布赫（Madhabi Puri Buch），后者的三年任期将于今年 3 月结束。【原文：India’s government has invited applications for the post of chairman of markets regulator Securities and Exchange Board of India, a signal it is looking replace current head Madhabi Puri Buch, whose three-year term ends in March.】

item.title: 避风港吸引力增强，日元表现优于 G-10 同行
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统与哥伦比亚就遣返被驱逐移民达成协议后，日元下跌，抹去了周一早些时候使日元成为十国集团中唯一对美元上涨的货币的涨幅。【原文：The yen fell after President Donald Trump reached a deal with Colombia on the return of deported migrants, erasing gains which made it the only Group-of-10 currency to rise against the dollar earlier on Monday.】

item.title: 中国 DeepSeek 的 iPhone 下载量居首位，刺激亚洲股市上涨
item.description: 中国初创公司 DeepSeek 的同名人工智能助手一举登上苹果公司 iPhone 下载排行榜榜首，引发硅谷对美国在人工智能领域领先优势的质疑。【原文：Chinese startup DeepSeek’s eponymous AI assistant rocketed to the top of Apple Inc.’s iPhone download charts, stirring doubts in Silicon Valley about the strength of America’s lead in AI.】

item.title: DeepSeek 震荡股市，交易员担心美国科技领导地位不保
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 周一震撼了全球科技股，引发了对美国技术主导地位的质疑。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek rocked global technology stocks Monday, raising questions over America’s technological dominance.】

item.title: 中国大宗商品企业在经济放缓中首当其冲
item.description: 中国的工业利润显示，大宗商品生产商在 2024 年年底将垫底。今年的情况也好不到哪里去。【原文：Chinese industrial profits show commodities producers ending 2024 at the bottom of the pile. This year’s looking no better.】

item.title: DeepSeek 引发竞争恐慌，日本芯片股下挫
item.description: 随着中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 的发展，包括 Advantest 公司在内的日本芯片相关股票暴跌，引发了人们对该应用将威胁美国技术领先地位的担忧。【原文：Japan’s chip-related shares including Advantest Corp. tumbled as Chinese AI startup DeepSeek gained traction, raising concern the app will threaten US’s technological leadership.】

item.title: 新西兰放宽签证规定，允许游客远程工作
item.description: 新西兰放宽了签证规定，允许外国游客在新西兰进行远程工作，因为新西兰依靠旅游业来帮助推动经济复苏。【原文：New Zealand has relaxed its visa rules to allow foreign visitors to work remotely while in the nation as it leans on tourism to help drive an economic recovery.】
